EmailTemplate.name: xbKycEmailTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: Pagbrasil - Form Filling
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please complete the KYC form at your earliest convenience to proceed with our onboarding process:
KYC Form: {!$Label.KYC_XB_URL}/?id={!KYC_XB__c.Unique_Link__c}
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
Thank you.
Kind Regards, PagBrasil
